cCpRU4LCV218.title: Use Post Excerpts
cCpRU4LCV218.fieldCaption: Use shortened content excerpts. If turned off the full post will display in post lists.

aultvykbU5ua.title: Excerpt Length
aultvykbU5ua.fieldCaption: The number of words in post excerpts, 250 max. Custom excerpts are not restricted by this setting.

oZ582SIm6g5k.title: Read More Link
oZ582SIm6g5k.fieldCaption: The link after post excerpts. Enter desired text. For no link leave blank or set to -1

FQ6IKTeJhrPV.title: Image Width
FQ6IKTeJhrPV.fieldCaption: Specify a width for images in the post list view.

llj4luJcp7na.title: Image Height
llj4luJcp7na.fieldCaption: Specify a height for images in the post list view.

CHjjtB6p2cgR.title: Show Tags
CHjjtB6p2cgR.fieldCaption: Show the tags associated with each post.

kKspineTvaur.title: Show Featured Image
kKspineTvaur.fieldCaption: Display the featured image on the single post. This may not apply to some post formats.

fQMsLqC7kIXo.title: Image Width
fQMsLqC7kIXo.fieldCaption: Specify a width for images on single posts.

jJv92l2y07BV.title: Image Height
jJv92l2y07BV.fieldCaption: Specify a height for images on single posts.

rkhOPToW8B9V.title: Show Post Navigation
rkhOPToW8B9V.fieldCaption: Include links to the next and previous post in your blog.
